Package store.business.util.logger

Class ContextualLogger

  • java.lang.Object
    • store.business.util.logger.ContextualLogger
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Logger
    public class ContextualLogger
extends java.lang.Object
implements Logger

    The contextual logger

    Logs the messages with a format. It implements the public interface Logger interface.

    Since:
    1.0.0
    Version:
    1.0.0
    Author:
    Raphael Dray
    See Also:
    Logger, SimpleDateFormat, Level
